job_details.experience_required: Minimum of 5 years of experience in integration development, with at least 3 years on the Azure platform.
job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: From: Barla Santosh, Gacsol sbarla@gacsol.com Reply to: sbarla@gacsol.com Title : Azure Integration Senior LeadLocation: Sylmar, CA (Remote) JOB DESCRIPTION:Seeking an Azure Integration Lead Developer for our Consumer Products client to work with team developing Azure based micro services platform. Primary Responsibilities:Lead the design, development, and implementation of integration solutions using Azure Integration Services.Develop and maintain APIs, Logic Apps, and Function APIs to facilitate communication between internal platforms.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and ensure integration solutions meet business needs.Monitor and troubleshoot integration processes to ensure optimal performance and reliability.Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers.Primary Skills:Extensive experience with Azure Integration Services (APIs, Logic Apps, Microservices, Function APIs, ADF).Strong understanding of RESTful API design and development.Proficiency in C# and .NET framework.Experience with Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipeline management.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.Minimum of 5 years of experience in integration development, with at least 3 years on the Azure platform.Azure certifications (e.g., Azure Developer Associate, Azure Solutions Architect) are a plus. Thanks,Barla SantoshTechnical RecruiterE: Sbarla@gacsol.com www.gacsol.com‘Experts in Digitalization and Engineering - Enterprise 4.0’
